question.Title: How do I calculate someone's age in C#?
question.Body: Given a DateTime representing a person's birthday, how do I calculate their age in years?

answer.Body:
The best way that I know of because of leap years and everything is:

DateTime birthDate = new DateTime(2000,3,1);int age = (int)Math.Floor((DateTime.Now - birthDate).TotalDays / 365.25D);

Hope this helps.
